title: Guardian
content:
Guardian may refer to:

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Abyssal guardian, guardians of the Abyss
  • Abyssal guardian (Guardians of the Rift), Abyssal guardians that are invading the Temple of the Eye
  • Ancient Guardian, part of the Below Ice Mountain quest
  • Cerberus, guardian of the River of Souls
  • Great Olm, the Guardian in the Deep
  • Grotesque Guardians, a pair of gargoyles
  • Guardian (Chambers of Xeric), an attackable statue in the Chambers of Xeric
  • Guardian of Armadyl, followers of Armadyl guarding the staff of Armadyl
  • Guardians of the Diamonds of Azzanadra:
    • Damis
    • Fareed
    • Kamil
  • Guardians of Iban:
    • Doomion
    • Holthion
    • Othainian
  • Kalphite Guardian, guardian of the Kalphite Queen
  • Scorpia's guardian, guardians of Scorpia
  • Stone Guardian, golems found in the Karamjan Temple
  • Temple guardian, guardian of the underground of Paterdomus

Non-player characters[edit | edit source]

  • Alchemy Guardian, one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
  • Archeio, guardian of the Arceuus Library's Historical Archive
  • Chamber guardian, guards the chamber of the Mage Arena
  • Enchantment Guardian, one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
  • Entrance Guardian, one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
  • Ghost, a guardian of the Shadow Realm
  • The Great Guardian, the main guardian in the Guardians of the Rift minigame
  • Other rune guardians from the Guardians of the Rift minigame:
    • Weak catalytic guardian
    • Weak elemental guardian
    • Medium catalytic guardian
    • Medium elemental guardian
    • Strong catalytic guardian
    • Strong elemental guardian
    • Overcharged catalytic guardian
    • Overcharged elemental guardian
  • Guardians of Guthix, guardians of sacred religion centres of Guthix worship
  • Guardian mummy, guardian of the Jalsavrah Pyramid
  • Malak, one of the guardians of the Diamonds of Azzanadra
  • Rewards Guardian, one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
  • Telekinetic Guardian, one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Guardians of the Rift, a minigame,
    • Guardians of the Rift (music track), the music track
  • Guardian boots, a pair of defensive oriented boots
  • Guardian statue, an item used in the Mage Training Arena's Telekinetic Theatre
  • Jagex Account Guardian, a feature from Jagex that provides enhanced security
  • Rift guardian, a skilling pet obtained from Runecraft
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Guardian''' may refer to:

===Monsters===
*[[Abyssal guardian]], guardians of the [[Abyss]]
*[[Abyssal guardian (Guardians of the Rift)]], Abyssal guardians that are invading the [[Temple of the Eye (location)|Temple of the Eye]]
*[[Ancient Guardian]], part of the [[Below Ice Mountain]] quest
*[[Cerberus]], guardian of the [[River of Souls]]
*[[Great Olm]], the Guardian in the Deep
*[[Grotesque Guardians]], a pair of [[gargoyle]]s
*[[Guardian (Chambers of Xeric)]], an attackable statue in the [[Chambers of Xeric]]
*[[Guardian of Armadyl]], followers of [[Armadyl]] guarding the [[staff of Armadyl]]
*Guardians of the [[Diamonds of Azzanadra]]:
**[[Damis]]
**[[Fareed]]
**[[Kamil]]
*Guardians of [[Iban]]:
**[[Doomion]]
**[[Holthion]]
**[[Othainian]]
*[[Kalphite Guardian]], guardian of the [[Kalphite Queen]]
*[[Scorpia's guardian]], guardians of [[Scorpia]]
*[[Stone Guardian]], golems found in the [[Karamjan Temple]]
*[[Temple guardian]], guardian of the underground of [[Paterdomus]]

===Non-player characters===
*[[Alchemy Guardian]], one of the guardians of the [[Mage Training Arena]]
*[[Archeio]], guardian of the [[Arceuus Library]]'s [[Library Historical Archive|Historical Archive]]
*[[Chamber guardian]], guards the chamber of the [[Mage Arena]]
*[[Enchantment Guardian]], one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
*[[Entrance Guardian]], one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
*[[Ghost (The General's Shadow)|Ghost]], a guardian of the [[Shadow Realm]]
*[[The Great Guardian]], the main guardian in the [[Guardians of the Rift]] minigame
*Other rune guardians from the Guardians of the Rift minigame:
**[[Weak catalytic guardian]]
**[[Weak elemental guardian]]
**[[Medium catalytic guardian]]
**[[Medium elemental guardian]]
**[[Strong catalytic guardian]]
**[[Strong elemental guardian]]
**[[Overcharged catalytic guardian]]
**[[Overcharged elemental guardian]]
*[[Guardians of Guthix]], guardians of sacred religion centres of Guthix worship
*[[Guardian mummy]], guardian of the [[Jalsavrah Pyramid]]
*[[Malak]], one of the guardians of the [[Diamonds of Azzanadra]]
*[[Rewards Guardian (Mage Training Arena)|Rewards Guardian]], one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena
*[[Telekinetic Guardian]], one of the guardians of the Mage Training Arena

===Other===
*[[Guardians of the Rift]], a minigame,
**[[Guardians of the Rift (music track)]], the music track
*[[Guardian boots]], a pair of defensive oriented [[boots]]
*[[Guardian statue]], an item used in the [[Mage Training Arena]]'s [[Telekinetic Theatre]]
*[[Jagex Account Guardian]], a feature from Jagex that provides enhanced security
*[[Rift guardian]], a [[skilling pet]] obtained from [[Runecraft]]
